benchmark_details.name: FictionalHot
benchmark_details.overview: FictionalHot is a benchmark designed to facilitate a fair and challenging evaluation of search agentsâ€™ reasoning abilities by mitigating the risk of data contamination, composed of recently curated questions about fictional entities that require complex, multi-hop reasoning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enable rigorous, contamination-resistant assessment of search agents' procedural reasoning instead of relying on memorization.

data.source: Newly generated synthetic corpus populated with fictitious entities created by paraphrasing questions from existing benchmarks.

methods: Evaluation of search agents in knowledge-intensive tasks using FictionalHot
